function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High urban density and crowding may contribute to increased transmission of contagious diseases due to close proximity and frequent interaction among people.","Impact":"Higher risk of rapid and widespread disease transmission, leading to larger outbreaks and difficulty in containment.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce urban density, promote social distancing, and improve ventilation and air quality in crowded spaces.","Technologies":"Smart city technologies for managing urban density and traffic flow, IoT devices for monitoring air quality, and urban planning tools for designing open and spacious environments.","People":"Urban residents, commuters, and visitors in densely populated areas.","Owner":"City governments, urban planners, and public health authorities."}]}
